author: Michael Moore
method: Take the rye bread and place it on a plate. Slice tomato, place it on the rye bread. Take the ham and place it on top of the tomato. Pre-heat pan with the oil - make sure pan is not too hot, break eggs into frying pan and fry until cooked. Remove eggs, place on top of ham and serve with the gherkin.
ingredients: 2 slices rye bread,  1 tomato,  50g/2oz cured ham,  2 tsp oil,  2 eggs,  1 large pickled gherkin
